data.name: PM in a Startup Setting by Alexa Product Lead
data.summary:
- Product Management in a Startup setting - for Intrapreneurs/ Entrepreneurs
- Minimum Viable Product is not a subset of the final set of features. It's a simple solution
- Be clear and firm on the North Star. Execution is where the flexibility should be
- "Product" is defined by the whole customer experience and not just the app/ feature
